title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Aircraft and ISR Capability

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to build the capacity of Mauritanias national military forces to conduct CT operations by providing the Mauritanian Air Force with an aerial intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR) capability, which will significantly expand the ability of Mauritanian forces to monitor AQIM movement across the countrys vast borders. Equipment provided includes two short takeoff and landing (STOL) aircraft, two ISR camera balls, and pilot, maintainer, and equipment capability training. The recipient unit is the Mauritanian Air Force, which is not divided into tactical units.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Contract Logistics Support (CLS)

description.narrative: The objective of this funding is to facilitate the expedited delivery and execution of the Mauritania Aircraft and ISR program ($21.73M) notified earlier in FY 2013 due to urgent operational requirements on the ground. This logistics capability will support the Mauritanian Air Force directly.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - GSI-7 Development

description.narrative: To conduct or support programs providing training and equipment to national security forces of foreign countries for the purpose of building capacity of partner nations. The Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA) provides program management. Country teams work through DoD geographic Combatant Commands (COCOMs).
